CustomField.formula: ((( Total_Billable_Hours__c + Total_Non_Billable_Hours__c) * Project_Cost_Per_Hour__c ) + ( Total_Billable_Expenses__c + Total_Non_Billable_Expenses__c ) + Contractor_Costs__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total cost for this project (Billable and Non Billable Hrs * Cost Per Hour + Billable and Non Billable Expenses + Contractor Costs)
CustomField.label: Project Cost
